fields.text: Thank you for calling Fossa in San Francisco, your autopilot for dependency tracking, license compliance, and attribution notices.
Press [INDEX] for Sales and product information.
Press [INDEX] to schedule a personalized product demo.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for demo scheduling.
Press [INDEX] for pricing and licensing options.
One moment please while we transfer you to our pricing specialist.
Press [INDEX] for Support and technical assistance.
Please hold while we connect you to a compliance specialist.
Press [INDEX] for developer tool setup and integration support.
Thank you for your patience. A support engineer will be with you shortly.
